Make sure you have a reliable group of friends to hang out with that are a good influence or you will fall in with the wrong crowd. Make sure you schedule classes after talking to multiple counselors so that you will be properly equipped. textAfterTable: What to do for fun Thomas Nelson is a very laid back community, and many of us enjoy playing frisbee on the lawn, or soccer in the field, or other misc. outside activities. Occasionally there are activities for the students as a whole to participate in. Food and Dining Because TNCC is a community college, there is not much to expect out of the food. The addition of the new Subway is pretty awesome though. Dorm Life Thomas Nelson does not have dorms. But the location of the campuses is very convenient for anyone living on the peninsula. Tips for prospective students 1. Be sure to have your classes settled in the first month of registration 2. Don't be afraid to ask questions to the professors, they are all willing to answer any questions you have. 3. Be willing to share your story and struggles with others, sharing will help broaden your range of possibilities for the future. In three sentences Thomas Nelson is a great place for people who are either returning to college or just starting, because it gives you a feel for how a 4-year institution will be. Thomas Nelson has many pluses and minuses but I think
